item.title: Foundation of User Experience Design
item.author: Bernardino Sassoli
item.description: My notes for Foundation of User Experience Design the first course in Google’s UX Design Professional Certificate on Coursera*. Don Norman (1998): first idea of UX –> The Design of Everyday Things UX => how a person feels about interacting with a product usability equity enjoyability usefulness Think of all potential users Design + structure + purpose (e.g. ketchup bottle evolution) Research from McKinsey shows that value of UX across industries -> increased likelihood of product being shared or recommended No similar shared background for UX designers: rather, curiosity, empathy sense of visuals.
